name: Data Requirements
description: The brew operation sends the BrewedBeverage resource to the Coffee/Tea brewing Device
comment:
The effect of invoking this operation is to initiate the Brew operation on the appropriate device with the inclusion of the 
  requested additions

parameter.name: BevBrew
parameter.documentation: The BrewedBeverage Resource that dictates the beverage to be brewed and the requested additions (if any)
